lead_paragraph: Andrea Duran hit a two-run homer in the fifth and the United States defeated Japan, 7-0, on the mercy rule in Caracas, Venezuela, to win the world softball championship for the seventh year in a row.
snippet: Andrea Duran hit a two-run homer in the fifth and the United States defeated Japan, 7-0, on the mercy rule in Caracas, Venezuela, to win the world softball championship for the seventh year in a row.
